name: Raw Carrot Dip
author: barbara
summary: A friend of mine gave me this recipe, and this is one of my favorite healthier dips. If you are into clean eating and raw-vegan dishes, try it for yourself!
ingredients: ¼ clove garlic, grated, or more to taste
2 teaspoons lemon juice, or to taste
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
directions: Place carrots in the bowl of a food processor; pulse until finely chopped
Scrape down the sides of the food processor a couple of times to make sure all of the carrots are finely chopped
Add tahini, olive oil, cumin seeds, garlic, lemon juice, salt, and pepper; process until smooth
Season with more salt, pepper, and lemon juice, if desired
